events.name: Lithium-Ion Recycling
events.wd_description: Three main methods are used in lithium-ion recycling.
events.description: Three main methods are used in lithium-ion recycling.

events.name: Pyrometallurgical
events.wd_description: The battery is melted in a hot furnace to recover some of the cathode metal.
events.description: The battery is melted in a hot furnace to recover some of the cathode metal.

events.name: Hydrometallurgical
events.wd_description: It employs specialized solution reagents to leach the targeted metals out from the cathode substance.
events.description: It employs specialized solution reagents to leach the targeted metals out from the cathode substance.

events.name: Bioleaching
events.wd_description: The bioleaching technique uses bacteria to retrieve precious metals.
events.description: The bioleaching technique uses bacteria to retrieve precious metals.
